item.title: How does DNS work?
item.author: aniket.patanwal99@gmail.com (Aniket Patanwal)
item.description: What are Hosted Zones? All DNS records are added in a hosted zone (Route 53, godaddy) What is Authoritative Name Server? Hosted Zones are served via ==Authoritative Name Server== For each domain a NS record is added which tells the Authoritative Name Server its hosted on![[Screenshot 2024-04-26 at 8.30.53 PM.png]] PS: Read Note^ Example: ns1.gns.com, ns-1.awsdns.com How To Reach the Authoritative Name Servers? We cant have a single Name Server which holds every record
